title: Scientists Revive Woolly Mice
description: A breakthrough in genetic engineering has led to the revival of woolly mice, a species that once roamed icy terrains.

title: New LIFE for the Iberian Lynx: 20 years of conservation success
description: After two decades of hard work to bring the Iberian Lynx back from the brink of extinction, one of LIFEâ€™s main goals - to move this iconic species out of the Red List Endangered category - has been achieved ahead of schedule.

title: Tasmanian Tiger Revival Project
description: A de-extinction project is working on bringing back the Tasmanian tiger through genetic cloning.
